ResearchProjectDef.label: Warchief MBT
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build the MBT-A10 War Tank, A super heavy Tank that can also deploy a low mech sheild and on demand for its own protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Avenger heavy helo
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build the Prototype Avenger Heavy Helicopter, An unarmed craft that is large enough to carry a craft within its compartments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conquistador warship
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build the PA-31 Warship. A small corvette Millitary ship with a fast firing cannon and Ability to deploy a Combat command via its air Horns.
